describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

country.description: Country and state of donor's residence.
country.example: Singapore; United Kingdom; Massachusetts USA; New South Wales Australia; Bauchi State; Nigeria
country.guidelines: Enter the country or state and country if available.

granular_location.description: Nearest city, town, or village to location of donor's residence.

duration.description: Duration of residence, in years, rounded up to the nearest whole number.
duration.guidelines: Enter either a single value or a range of values. Indicate a range using a hyphen.

area_type.description: Urban, suburban, or rural descriptor of residence.
area_type.guidelines: Should be one of: urban; suburban; rural
